Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Janssen Spaans Schipper's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 24 years, Janssen Spaans Schipper has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Janssen Spaans Schipper is currently widowed. His children are named Brinkman, Jasmijn and Luna.
Education Background:
Janssen finished secondary school at Westfriesgymnasium Hoorn in 1995.
He then attended Tio University of Applied Sciences, which he graduated in 2000.
He also pursued further higher education at Nyenrode Business Universiteit, graduating in 2003.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 24 years, Janssen Spaans Schipper brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Janssen Spaans Schipper began his professional journey as a Hotel Manager at Marriott International Nederland B.V. in 2001, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a General Manager at Marriott International Nederland B.V., where he continued to grow professionally from 2007 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 360000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has villa located in Eindhoven, worth 2100000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 2260000 EUR from his grandmother, a respected Investment Banker, in 2010, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Janssen as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
